title: [CLIENT] Bloodmoon Thresh skin bugs
body:
Bloodmoon Thresh doesn't get remembered like other skins, reverting to (for me) championship or classic skin when i played bloodmoon last game.

[GAMEPLAY] Also when collecting souls, the aura is sometimes green instead of red.

replies.body:
We'll take a look at the client issue! 

The green souls is a known issue, and we're working on a fix! 

Thanks for the report!

My ONLY complaint about Bloodmoon Thresh is that, if i'm not paying attention and the other team has a Thresh too, those souls all look just about the same. It isn't a huge issue, but a little better clarity would help.
